translations.text: And what do you know what the Calamity is?
On that Day human beings shall be like scattered moths,
and the mountains shall be like fluffs of carded wool in varying colours.<sup foot_note="182825">1</sup>
Then<sup foot_note="182826">1</sup> he whose scales weigh heavier
but he whose scales weigh lighter,<sup foot_note="182827">1</sup>
his shall be the deep pit for a dwelling.<sup foot_note="182828">1</sup>
And what do you know what that is?
